results.content: More explanations should have been provided rather than just watch him code in isolation. Even then, despite my disappointment and criticism, I would still like to thank and congratulate the lecturer because there were few instances during the course that I did learnt few concepts here and there, along with quizzes provided. I would like the lecturer to encourage & improve content delivery in future. Cheers!!!

results.content: Good course but difficult to follow at times as there was no explanation for some of the content. The instructor is clearly knowledgeable about the subject but says "watch and follow me" and although he demonstrates and gives code, there is no explanation for what he is doing.

results.content: Easy to follow very informative and interesting but couldn’t do the coding exercises via my mobile. But great course.

results.content: I find the videos really helpful and the sections at the end to do your own work extremely helpful. A little more explaining whilst the videos are on would be nice instead of mainly silence.

results.content: Its good, but i needed some youtube help at some points, overall it is good for a complete starter

results.content:
Too simple.  There is no need to read the power point text. Showing by example is good. Pronunciation of certain words such as "Title" is incorrect. 
In the exercise where </br> tags should be added, it is not necessary to add 3 </br> tags. It is sufficient to add only 2 of them since the text is printed on 3 separate lines. The 3rd tag does nothing.
results.content_html:
